Title: Sick Leave
Text:
Put 3 counters on this card and put it beside yourself. At upkeep, remove one counter from it. At 0, discard this card.

As long as this card is laying beside you, you cannot place counters on Tickets.

Title: Unexpected Failure
Text: Place 2 Tickets on the most expensive completed Feature. In case of a tie, let the CEO choose.

Title: Sunset A Feature
Text:
Remove one Feature from the Product whose removal won't break the Product graph in two or more parts.

If the removed Feature is not Completed, place 1 counter on any Ticket for each Ticket on the removed Feature.
Funny text: At least we can spend our time on something we really care about!

Title: Lagging Behind
Text: If the Product has 4 or more Features (both Completed and not) and if the Tier 1 Milestone is not in the Product yet, everyone discards 2 cards. For everyone who doesn't have enough cards, remove 1 counter from any Ticket.

Title: Feature Creep
Text:
Take the first Feature from the bottom of the Player Deck. Put it on any valid place in the Product. Put 1 extra Ticket on it.

If there is no valid place for the Feature, discard it.

Shuffle the deck.
Notes: Formerly, the unplaced Feature was put back in the deck.
